name: El Dia Despues
overview: The action takes place in Galicia, in 1936, 19 July. You are Xoan Xestoso Dopico, General Vice-Secretary of the Galician Party, and you must save your life. But first, you have to get in touch with the General Secretary and other characters to help you in your escape. Adventure without illustrations. Submitted to the MicroHobby Adventure Contest, it was later distributed by Year Zero Soft.
